meanings.definition: The quality or state of being omnipotent.
meanings.sent1: Her belief in the omnipotences of the superhero gave her hope.
meanings.sent2: The gods in the myth had omnipotences that allowed them to control nature.
meanings.sent3: The omnipotences of the toddler were on full display when he convinced his parents to buy him a toy.
meanings.sent4: The CEO's omnipotences in the business world made her a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The magician's omnipotences on stage mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: The ability to do anything or everything.
meanings.sent1: In fairy tales, characters often possess omnipotences to overcome challenges.
meanings.sent2: The wizard's omnipotences allowed him to cast powerful spells.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics showcased its omnipotences in finding hidden toys.
meanings.sent4: The artist's omnipotences with a paintbrush transformed a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The inventor's omnipotences in creating new gadgets revolutionized the industry.
